name: Welcome
description:
Welcome to CmdLib!

Please run this command with hold.

name: Python Script
description: Notify Hello World with a python script

name: Pixelize Image
command:
convert -scale 50%  IMAGE_FILE  -magnify  PIXELIMAGE_FILE

# for more pixelization:
#convert -scale 25%  IMAGE_FILE  -magnify -magnify  PIXELIMAGE_FILE

name: MultiCmd Test
command:
notify-send "This is a test, with the goal to test multi-command entries in CmdLib. This text is really long to check the word wrap of the command text field."
notify-send "world"
HOLD cowsay "hello world"

# this is a comment
espeak "hello world"

name: MultiCmd Train Parallel
command:
# show the train
sl

# add sound
espeak "choo choo"

name: MultiCmd Train Serial
command:
# show the train
sl

# add sound
espeak "choo choo"
